messages.subject: a kind of report on alternative education
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.creatinglearningcommunities.org/resources/ lifelonglearning.htm That s a link to something I just received by e-mail, called Life-long Learning A
messages.messageBody:
http://www.creatinglearningcommunities.org/resources/
lifelonglearning.htm
That's a link to something I just received by e-mail, called
Life-long Learning
A project of
A COALITION FOR SELF-LEARNING
"The White Paper"

It's a general report on alternative education, mentioned John Holt
and has some info on homeschooling too.

Their main page is
http://www.creatinglearningcommunities.org/

It's not directly about unschooling, but some of you might be able to
use it for one reason or another. It might serve as a bridge for
some of you whose educator relatives think you're just off the wall,
or those who are involved with alternative schools or who are former
educators who just want assurance that all the school reform hasn't
been forgotten... there it is.

Sandra




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
